page.title: 16Swimming in Fremington
page.content: Lots of people in Fremington enjoy going swimming. Most people in Fremington go to Barnstaple leisure centre. In summer the children can use the school swimming pool.People also go swimming in the sea at Instow three miles away.People cant swim in the estuary near by because there is too much pollution from the abbatoir. Most people learn to swim at school. They get their first lesson in the reception. The children go swimming everyday throughout the summer.The pool is 12 metres long and 5 metres in width and 75cm deep. It is not really big enough but it is still enjoyable and a very useful place.The older children in the Winter go swimming at the leisure centre. Where the extra size and depth allows to practice there strokes diving and lifesaving.
